name: YouTube - Hatchetman ICP progress bar
description: Customizes the YouTube progress bar. (Original Code By: TokHaar) This style only works on YouTube videos supporting the HTML5 video player. You must also have the HTML5 video player enabled on your YouTube account you can do that here.
additional_info:
August 31st, 2017
Update 2: Updated code to work with the current YouTube. Gradient bar no longer shows.
Spinning hatchetman still works.

------------------
January 29th, 2014
Update 1: Fixed the Spinning hatchetman from being to low on the bar.
